section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ITALPOLLINA S.p.A. is among others a member of EBIC (European Biostimulant Industry Council), ECOFI (European Consortium of the Organic-Based Fertilizer Industry) and ESPP at European level. 
At National level, ITALPOLLINA S.p.A. is among others a member of Assofertilizanti (Italy) and AFAIA (France) 
 
ITALPOLLINA is also involved on standardization (AFNOR, CEN/TC 260, CEN/TC 455 et ISO/TC 134)
goals__remit: ITALPOLLINA is a world leader in the production of organic fertilizers, biostimulants of vegetal origin and beneficial microorganisms. A comprehensive and diversified catalogue is available in more than 80 countries worldwide and offers a wide range of innovative solutions for a modern and sustainable agriculture, whose principles are alimentary and environmental safety.
